scripts.test-hello: npx eosio-asc ./hello/hello.ts && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_hello
scripts.test-inlineaction: npx eosio-asc ./inlineaction/inlineaction.ts && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_action
scripts.test-eosio.token: npx eosio-asc ./eosio.token/eosio.token.ts && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_token
scripts.test-counter: npx eosio-asc ./counter/counter.ts && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_counter
scripts.test-codegeneration: npx eosio-asc ./codegeneration/codegeneration.ts && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_codegeneration
scripts.test: npm run test-hello && npm run test-inlineaction && npm run test-eosio.token && npm run test-counter && npm run test-codegeneration
